rows.label: qst720301_msg0001
rows.name:
The camp in the Seigle Hills
should be around here somewhere...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0002
rows.name: Hey, isn't that him?!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0003
rows.name: ...Whoa!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0004
rows.name: Wait! You don't need to run away!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0005
rows.name: Yeah! We're not enemies!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0006
rows.name: You're... not my enemies?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0007
rows.name: Looks like he believes us.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0008
rows.name:
We're with the Superbian
army and its allies.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0009
rows.name:
We know Torigo Village was burned down,
and we're protecting the refugees.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0010
rows.name: Did you escape from Torigo as well?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0011
rows.name: ...Yeah.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0012
rows.name: What's your name?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0013
rows.name: Kai...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0014
rows.name:
Kai, do you know Lasqam Harbor?
A ship from our country
is anchored there.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0015
rows.name:
I know it!
It's a big, magnificent ship, right?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0016
rows.name:
Then why don't you come with us?
We can get you a hot meal.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0018
rows.name:
What's the matter?
Don't you want to go to the ship?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0019
rows.name: It's not that...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0020
rows.name:
It's not that, but...
Kei... my younger sister is gone.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0021
rows.name: I... I have to find Kei...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0022
rows.name:
You should have said
that from the start.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0023
rows.name:
We'll find your sister,
so you go on to the harbor
and wait on the ship.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0024
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Huh...

rows.label: qst720301_msg0025
rows.name:
Hikari's right.
We promise we'll find your sister.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0026
rows.name: Can I really trust you?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0027
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: qst720301_msg0028
rows.name:
Hey, any idea where
Kei might be?

rows.label: qst720301_msg0029
rows.name:
She was really interested in that
big ship in Lasqam Harbor.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0030
rows.name:
Maybe she's somewhere she can
get a good view of the ship.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0031
rows.name:
I see. Let's try searching the high
ground overlooking the harbor, then.

rows.label: qst720301_msg0032
rows.name:
I'll wait at the harbor...
Please bring Kei back!
